marketplace.question: How does the marketplace work?
marketplace.answer: Our marketplace connects buyers and sellers directly. List your discs with photos and details, or browse available discs with advanced filters.

listings.question: Can I list discs for free?
listings.answer: Yes! all listings are completely free.

scores.question: How do I track my scores?
scores.answer: Simply open the app during your round, select your course, and input scores as you play. The app automatically calculates statistics and tracks your progress.

subscription.question: Is this another subscription app?
subscription.answer: No! There are no subscription and no inapp purchases. (And it is not part of our strategy to add it in the future)
